channel.title: Posts on IM-LAB (BETA)
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on IM-LAB (BETA)

item.title: ImLab was awarded NIH Cloud Credit
item.description:
We are delighted to be awarded NIH Cloud Credit that will help us fund our cloud-based web applications and databases and broadly share our tools and resources.

Information about Cloud Credits here

item.title: U4C Challenge Winners
item.description:
Two out of 4 winners used PrediXcan üëçüëç

Winners of “Up For A Challenge (U4C): Stimulating innovation in breast cancer genetic epidemiology” papers published on line link here.

Here is our contribution in collaboration with Guimin Gao, Brandon Pierce, Funmi Olopade, and Dezheng Huo link to paper here

item.title: S-PrediXcan (MetaXcan) in drug repositioning
item.description: So et al use S-PrediXcan to find psychiatric drug repositioning candidates.

item.title: Dinner with Nancy at the GTEx meeting
item.description: After the last formal GTEx analysis working group’s internal meeting at Rockville, MD, the Im Lab went for dinner with Nancy Cox, Barbara Stranger, and Eric Gamazon. From left to right: Rodrigo, Milton, Jiamao, Barbara, Nancy, Eric, Haky, Scott, and Alvaro. Great French dishes with Asian influence.
